title: A Day with Timmy Page
creator_credit: David Hoffman, Iris Hoffman and Amram Nowak Associates
brief_description: An 11 year old filmmaker is seen at work with his associates, explaining his techniques and ideas - casting, and other aspects of his filmmaking. Short excerpts from the twenty 10 minute films he has completed in ten months are shown and some very amusing insights into his self-assertive personality and the serious approach he takes are given.
